p: SAL, SBS, JSG, AP, TL, EV and SB conceived of this study. SAL, JSG, MJR, JLM and EN were responsible for study implementation and supervision. AP and TL were responsible for laboratory protocols and quality control. AME and EA were responsible for data merging and management. AME led the analysis with assistance from EA, SAL and SS. Data were interpreted by SAL, AME, JSG, AP, TL, WDFV, EN, SB and SS. SAL and AME wrote the paper. All authors reviewed, edited and approved the final manuscript.
